negotiation_message:
Alice said in round 1: Hi Lingyao, based on the items available and their values to me, I propose the following split:
I get:
- All 4 hats (total value to me = 8)
You get:
- The 1 book and 2 balls (total value to me = 2)
This split gives me a higher total value. Let me know what you think and if you have any other proposals.
Lingyao replied in round 1: halt negotiation
